segments.text: I notice the woman is so absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children sneaking cookies, their faces lit up with joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, his hand reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched, eyes sparkling with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman's obliviousness is almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting wetter by the second, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's almost a joke compared to the indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water dripping down the cabinets, creating a slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like laughing at the absurdity of the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
